Gianni James Favaretto

A British boy growing up in rural Tuscany joined the Navy, became a missionary, moved to the US to grasp Computer Science and Design, and ever since spent passionately something like 70.000 hours on his craft to become inadvertently decent at ...

Design.
UXperience.
Leadership.

What I do Work References Blog Me

Most organisations struggle to exploit design. Designers are misaligned, and craftsmanship doesn't excel.

With action, know-how, and a strong work ethic, I set up individuals and organisations to succeed by and with design.

I build, coach, and lead teams of any size to be well-integrated and of value in the organisation.

Strategically, I assess and level up design standards to ultimately exceed business and people's expectations.

I facilitate creative thinking and multidisciplinary collaborations by design.

What I do Work References Blog Me

Nov 2020 - Today

Director of Design

@ Chargebee (Worldwide)

Chargebee is a billing platform for subscription based SaaS and eCommerce businesses.

I'm leading the Global Product Design team that works collaboratively with all functions to deliver the world's best subscription management platform for SaaS and eCommerce businesses.

Oct 2019 - Jul 2020

Head of Experience Design

@ Zopa Bank (UK, ES)

I led the Experience Design team (Product and Service Design) that works with engineering and product to create user-centred financial experiences across all digital channels.

Zopa became a bank in 2020 and is the first P2P lending business platform in the World and the #1 in the UK.

Oct 2019 - Jul 2020

Head of UX and Product Design

@ Sainsbury's Argos (UK)

I led the User Experience, Product Design, UX Research, and UX Writing teams to create digital experiences across mobile, desktop, application, in-store and new channels as they emerge in Argos, Argos Financial Services, Tu Clothing, and Habitat.

With 29 million store customers and nearly a billion online visitors every year (in terms of size) Sainsbury's Argos is, only after eBay and Amazon, the biggest online retail in the UK.

Mar 2015 - Jan 2019

UX & Design Chapter Lead

@ Ocado Technology (UK, PL, ES)

The Ocado Smart Platform (OSP) is Ocado's world-class suite of solutions for operating online grocery businesses.

From a startup to a scale-up phase, I built, scaled and led the UX and Design team while crafting and directing the user experience and design of the Ocado Smart Platform (B2B and B2C).

June 2014 – Apr 2016

UX and Design Chapter Lead

@ Fabled by Marie Claire (UK)

With the same team built for Ocado's General Merchandise Ecommerce Platform (Fetch.co.uk), I crafted and directed the UX and Design of Fabled.com while managing Marie Claire's business expectations.

Fabled by Marie Claire is a premium beauty and wellbeing retailer which trades online through Fabled.com and through a dedicated premium beauty retail store in London.

Sep 2012 - Apr 2016

UX and Design Chapter Lead

@ Fetch by Ocado (UK)

From a startup to a scale-up phase, I built and led the UX and Design Chapter while crafting and directing the user experience and design of Fetch.co.uk and Sizzle.co.uk (Ocado's General Merchandise Ecommerce Platform).

Fetch is Ocado, but for pets. We look after your pet’s shopping list – from natural, grain-free food to more specialised diets, toys, and treats. In 2016, Fetch was one of the top ecommerce destinations for pet owners in the UK.

Mar 2010 - Sept 2012

Sr Designer UX Manager

@ Ocado.com (UK)

I crafted and led the design of the core UX features of the Webshop and awarded IOS native mobile and tablet apps. I have been on the front-line in delivering Ocado's most significant shopping experience redesign.

Ocado has been voted the best online supermarket in the UK by Which? readers every year since 2010.

2002 - 2010

Director, Designer, Dev, Instructor

@ Freelance (Italy, USA, UAE)

Clients included Sun Microsystem, Nasa, ENI, Novartis, Thomson Reuters, Sacbo International Airport, Fila, CIM e-Banking, Bergamo Council, and more.

User Experience, Design, Art Direction, UI Development, Accessibility consultancy, Branding and Training.

Designing user interfaces (user research, wireframing, prototyping, and visual design) for both conventional websites/portals and web applications. Consultant on Web Accessibility. Hand coding (X)HTML, CSS, Actionscript 3, JavaScript, XML / XSL. Worked on projects based on PHP, Java, .Net and ColdFusion. Art direction and corporate identity design. Team leadership and project management.

2002 - 2005

Consultant, Speaker, and Instructor

@ Macromedia (Italy)

I'm leading the Global Product Design team that works collaboratively with all functions to deliver the world's best subscription management platform for SaaS and eCommerce businesses.

2001 - 2002

Web Art Director

@ Sesaab Group (Italy)

I'm leading the Global Product Design team that works collaboratively with all functions to deliver the world's best subscription management platform for SaaS and eCommerce businesses.

2002 - 2005

Consultant, Speaker, and Instructor

@ Macromedia (Italy)

I'm leading the Global Product Design team that works collaboratively with all functions to deliver the world's best subscription management platform for SaaS and eCommerce businesses.

2001 - 2002

Web Art Director

@ Sesaab Group (Italy)

I'm leading the Global Product Design team that works collaboratively with all functions to deliver the world's best subscription management platform for SaaS and eCommerce businesses.

What I do Work References Blog Me

Gianni was instrumental in setting up our user experience design practice at Zopa – as soon as he came in, he managed to get the best out of the existing designers thanks to a set of effective design processes. He was also very effective in quickly assembling a team of strong individuals, one of them then went on to win the Zopian of month just a few months after joining. The team went on to receive high praise throughout the business and won Zopa’s team of the week award after helping to redesign our website and app in time for our bank launch.

I can highly recommend Gianni if you are trying to create an effective design team that works well with the rest of the business. Gianni is also a very effective mentor and manager for the designers themselves.

Didier Baclin Chief Product Officer @ Zopa Bank (2020)

Gianni is someone who is not afraid of a challenge. He joined Zopa at a time when proving the value of design was high on the agenda, and our small team needed leadership and direction.

He quickly put in place the structure and processes we needed to establish a more user-centred culture across the company, and scaled the experience team from the ground up.

Every decision he took was thoughtful but bold; balancing team wellbeing and results.

Gianni is also someone who cares deeply about the people he works with, and created a strong bond with the team. He has been an inspirational leader and challenging mentor, and I hope we can work together again.

Laura Sellman Senior Product Designer @ Zopa Bank (2020)

What I do Work References Blog Me

I was born in the countryside of Sussex (UK). Yet, I ended up growing up – with my seven siblings – amid the Renaissance art and the green of Tuscany, Italy.

At the age of seventeen, I voluntarily joined and served the Navy; I graduated from the Academy with a specialisation in Radar and TLC ...

... to then serving thirty-two months on a ship, including six months in the Gulf War (Operation Desert Storm).

I served as an LDS missionary for fifteen months. Despite being the most successful missionary in the field (the only one to earn the Master Teacher title), I was sent home a bit earlier because I was seen as too unconventional.

Gianni J. Favaretto giannijfavaretto@gmail.com
